properties.areaDesc: Upper North Platte River Basin; Southwest Carbon County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 2:14PM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW AT TIMES WILL IMPACT AREAS ALONG AND
WEST OF THE LARAMIE RANGE SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Southwest Carbon County including Baggs and Dixon...
Upper North Platte River Basin...including Saratoga and
Encampment.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor driving
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
